title.rendered: 2 Upton Road in Scarborough ON by <?php echo $name; ?>

content.rendered:
Portfolio

2 Upton Road by

 

2 Upton Road by

Project Description

This development features two modern towers connected by a shared podium. The project comprises 164 residential units, complemented by commercial spaces strategically located along Upton Road and Warden Avenue. The design emphasizes an upscale streetscape, incorporating high-quality materials and prominent architectural elements that enhance the façade composition. The corner exposure further elevates the visual appeal, contributing to a distinctive and sophisticated presence in the neighbourhood.

Share on facebook
Share on google
Share on twitter
Share on linkedin

Project Details

  • Client: Private 
  • Budget: 70,000,000
  • Location: 2 Upton Road, Scarborough, ON
  • GFA: 175,000 s.f.
  • Architect:

Looking for Architects for your next project?

We have the best solution for your project. Quality and innovation to make your plans come true.

Get in Touch
Contact us
